verses.name: Nehemiah 6:15
verses.text: So the wall was finished in the twenty and fifth day of the month Elul, in fifty and two days.

verses.name: Nehemiah 6:16
verses.text: And it came to pass, that when all our enemies heard thereof, and all the heathen that were about us saw these things, they were much cast down in their own eyes: for they perceived that this work was wrought of our God.

verses.name: Nehemiah 6:17
verses.text: Moreover in those days the nobles of Judah sent many letters unto Tobiah, and the letters of Tobiah came unto them.
